Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Noah A. Lefevre "akb723"
Reviews.Content: A very good notebook by HP. Not only works smoothly but is beautiful in silver color. Excellent configuration with i7 4720MQ 16GB memory with 2 TB Hard Drive. I however gave it to my son as gift. Very quick to start and shut down, Windows 8.1.

Reviews.Title: Nice quality screen, good pc.
Reviews.Author: Critty Cal
Reviews.Content: The screen has a matte finish, is sharp and has a good viewing angle. It is quick and has plenty of specs for the price. Big screen laptop with plenty of screen real estate to get the job done.

Reviews.Title: Graphic card was probably defective and died after few days
Reviews.Author: Yulia
Reviews.Content: The laptop itself is beautiful and comfortable, I will not stop on this.The first time there was a problem when trying to update the driver for Nvidia, the new driver did not want to be installed and only in safe mode, set the main component of the graphics driver, no additional parts coming with him. In the evening I ran Google Erth, which uses the graphics card, then turned off the computer and went to sleep. In the morning, the computer does not start at all and I returned it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Be careful when purchasing this machine
Reviews.Author: Francine Chariandy
Reviews.Content: I live in Trinidad and bought this laptop for my son it came without and operating system (windows 8) he was very disappointed and had it returned. I am very impressed with Amazon Customer Service for all the help and quick response.

Reviews.Title: WHO IS VERY VERY AMAZING THIS THINK
Reviews.Author: silvia moran
Reviews.Content: EVERTHING HAVE TU BUY THATTHE LEAP MOTION IS VERY FASTTHE INTERNET IS VERY FASTHAVE A AUDIO VERY INCREIDIBLE
